Songs

  • {{ song.name }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { SpotifyService } from '../spotify.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-artist-songs', templateUrl: './artist-songs.component.html', styleUrls: ['./artist-songs.component.css'] }) export class ArtistSongsComponent implements OnInit{ albumId!: string; songs: any[] = []; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private spotifyService: SpotifyService ) { } ngOnInit() { this.route.params.subscribe(params => { this.albumId = params['id']; this.getSongs(); }); } getSongs() { this.spotifyService.getAlbumSongs(this.albumId).subscribe(data => { this.songs = data.items; console.log(this.songs) }); } }
